department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: one of a pair of well-cast gilt-bronze figures of Bodhisattvas, each shown seated on a lotus base, with one arm resting on a raised knee, the other hand resting on the thigh, one holding a covered jar (.1), the other an ambrosia bottle and a brush (.2), each wearing a crisply draped dhoti, the long hair falling over the shoulder and pulled up into a topknot, both with blue green encrustation
title: Bodhisattva, One of a Pair
